recommendations: Not appearing for "mexican near me", "mexican", "best mexican Thornton", "mexican delivery near me", "mexican Thornton Colorado", "top mexican Thornton", "mexican restaurant near me", "mexican food Thornton" - optimize Google My Business profile with these keywords
Low Local Pack visibility (0%) - audit your Google My Business completeness, categories, and local citations

reviews.text: You had me at breakfast burritos all day!! $2 taco Tuesdays as well. The inferno is spicy and a 10/10. We will definitely be back! Advice is to get two and split with a partner so you can try each!

If you want a great meal and exceptional service, Renegade Burrito in Thornton is the place to go.  I love treating myself to breakfast every Sunday, and I usually bring my laptop to get some writing done while enjoying my burrito.  The T's burrito is my personal favorite, especially with sausage. But what truly sets Renegade Burrito apart is the exceptional staff at the Thornton location. They are always friendly and just glad to see you. They remember my order better than I do.  And since I sit and eat in the dining room, I can tell that they treat everyone just as well.  If you are looking for great food and to be served by people who truly appreciate you, this is the place to go every time.

Highly recommend!

I had the corn tortillas with sausage and green chile. Nothing to object about. The chile is mild enough to allow the rest of the flavor to shine through. The eggs are probably powdered, though. Good service overall, and clean restrooms.

The food was good, but the rice was as hard as a rock? And when I attempted to get a refund, the owner
Essentially refused to give me a refund on 1.40$ as it was not on my original card order which I paid for in cash.
After the original order
Very unprofessional.
Apparently renegade burrito, you need my dollar forty more than I do.You could have it BOO!!! (FYI 4 hours later the wife found a piece of hair on a churro chip) ü§Æ

First time trying them out and while the contents of my tacos were pretty flavorful I had to eat them with a fork because the corn tortillas crumbled instantly as soon as I picked it up. Not sure if they were old or what. The servers could be replaced with robots. No greeting, no smiles, I was never asked ‚Äúwhat can I get for‚Äù nothing. One of them just looked at me for a seconds and I took that as my indication she finally ready to take my order. As she was working on a door dash order when I entered. My tacos aren‚Äôt the specialty‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt know but it‚Äôs my first and last time here.

editorial_summary.overview: Relaxed counter-serve spot for California-style burritos with diverse fillings & other Mexican fare.

recentReviews.author: David Gragg
recentReviews.text:
If you want a great meal and exceptional service, Renegade Burrito in Thornton is the place to go.  I love treating myself to breakfast every Sunday, and I usually bring my laptop to get some writing done while enjoying my burrito.  The T's burrito is my personal favorite, especially with sausage. But what truly sets Renegade Burrito apart is the exceptional staff at the Thornton location. They are always friendly and just glad to see you. They remember my order better than I do.  And since I sit and eat in the dining room, I can tell that they treat everyone just as well.  If you are looking for great food and to be served by people who truly appreciate you, this is the place to go every time.

Highly recommend!

recentReviews.author: Stevee Kenworthy
recentReviews.text: You had me at breakfast burritos all day!! $2 taco Tuesdays as well. The inferno is spicy and a 10/10. We will definitely be back! Advice is to get two and split with a partner so you can try each!

recentReviews.author: James Hudlemeyer
recentReviews.text: I had the corn tortillas with sausage and green chile. Nothing to object about. The chile is mild enough to allow the rest of the flavor to shine through. The eggs are probably powdered, though. Good service overall, and clean restrooms.

recentReviews.author: Marquita Holmes
recentReviews.text: First time trying them out and while the contents of my tacos were pretty flavorful I had to eat them with a fork because the corn tortillas crumbled instantly as soon as I picked it up. Not sure if they were old or what. The servers could be replaced with robots. No greeting, no smiles, I was never asked ‚Äúwhat can I get for‚Äù nothing. One of them just looked at me for a seconds and I took that as my indication she finally ready to take my order. As she was working on a door dash order when I entered. My tacos aren‚Äôt the specialty‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt know but it‚Äôs my first and last time here.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.4/5 rating from 5 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the all-day breakfast burritos and $2 taco Tuesdays, which are standout menu offerings. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The exceptional and friendly service at the Thornton location, where staff remember regular customers' orders, creates a welcoming and personalized dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The dining room provides a comfortable atmosphere for customers to relax and enjoy their meals, making it an ideal spot for regular visits. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Unprofessional handling of refund requests and hygiene concerns (hair found in food) - review management can address this concern
Lack of customer service and engagement (servers not greeting or smiling) - social media marketing can improve this area
Poor quality of food items (crumbly tortillas and hard rice) - Boostly marketing services can improve this

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
